comments.body:
This is actually deliberate-- copy-pasta is for code that's been copied and pasted and is now spaghetti ;)

if you google "copypasta code" you'll see that I'm not the first to use it this way.
Isnt that the difference between registered and enabled? You can register all groups, but group will be added to Scheme only when it is enabled.
Added a section here and in the registered package.
